#summary Preparing Java environment for mobile application development.


1. Download and install the latest version of JDK from the link below:

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

2. Download and install the latest version of J2ME from the link below:

http://java.sun.com/javame/downloads/index.jsp

3. Download and install the latest version of NetBeans IDE from the website 

http://netbeans.org/downloads/index.html

Choose the Java from the all products(it is the 3rd one, between JavaFX and Ruby, the one with 
Java ME support)

Configuring the NetBeans: during the installation add the path for your JDK and the path J2ME.
